This centralizes the install and management of all package dependencies for the course. It is recommended to run this code block once at the beginning of the course, and then comment it out to avoid unnecessary package installations in subsequent runs.

```{julia}
#| echo: false
using Pkg
Pkg.activate(".")
Pkg.instantiate()
Pkg.add("Statistics"); Pkg.add("Plots"); # Lecture 1.1
Pkg.add("BenchmarkTools"); # Lecture 1.3
Pkg.add("ForwardDiff"); Pkg.add("FiniteDifferences"); Pkg.add("Symbolics"); Pkg.add("Latexify") # Lecture 2.2
Pkg.add("Distributions"); Pkg.add("QuantEcon") # Lecture 2.3
Pkg.add("LinearAlgebra"); # Lecture 3.1
Pkg.add("NLsolve"); Pkg.add("LinearAlgebra"); # Lecture 3.2
```
